title: Chapter 618: 560: The Big Wedding_2
body:
Chapter 618: 560: The Big Wedding_2



Chapter 618: Chapter 560: The Big Wedding_2

Charlotte Lane wouldn’t change her mind.

The screenwriter award for Flynn Ninevara was collected on Catherine’s behalf by Morris.

George Dunn collected Daisy Zane’s Best Actress award on her behalf.

Both explained that she was unable to leave the laboratory. Everyone expressed their understanding.

Charlotte Lane stood motionless at the entrance of the laboratory for a long time when she saw the news online.

She stared at the name “Daisy Zane” on the trophy, unable to come to her senses for a long time.

The name Daisy Zane finally appeared in the Best Actress lineup.

Flynn Ninevara and Daisy Zane appeared together in the same movie and both won awards.

“Little girl,” Kevin Clark gently touched her face.

Charlotte Lane looked at Kevin Clark and regained her senses: “Shouldn’t I have dropped everything and gone to the awards ceremony last night?”

Kevin Clark touched her reddened eyes: “Last night, Lady Zane went.”



Charlotte Lane looked at him and laughed after a moment.

Kevin Clark always knew how to comfort her precisely.

Not appearing in person at the awards ceremony became Charlotte Lane’s regret.

Once she was less busy at the Research Institute, Charlotte Lane planned to write a new script and participate in another award show during her free time.

In November, “Hope” was nominated for the Golden Tiger Award again.

When Charlotte Lane received the news, she was thinking of a name for her female lead character, and then she named her character Jin Yin (Golden Tiger).

On December 29th, Charlotte Lane attended the awards ceremony.

Kevin Clark accompanied her and even went directly to the venue, sitting next to Charlotte Lane.



Charlotte Lane felt a sour swelling in her heart. She pinched her fingertips and turned her head to look at Kevin Clark.

Kevin Clark’s eyes were filled with tender laughter as he looked at her. It quickly soothed Charlotte Lane’s emotions.

She stood up, turned around, and bowed slightly.

Kevin Clark, Morris, and George Dunn all stood up.

As Charlotte Lane looked at them, Gentry Morris opened his arms as if to hug her.

However, the instant his arms opened, Kevin Clark’s gaze, filled with laughter as he watched Charlotte Lane, suddenly floated over.

The tender laughter instantly turned into a cold, sharp blade.

Feeling his life was threatened, Gentry Morris quickly dropped his hands and laughed awkwardly.

Those present who knew what had happened burst into laughter.



Not just the people at the scene, but even the netizens watching the live stream couldn’t help laughing.

[Third Master’s gaze is oppressive.]

[Third Master: Morris, you old fellow, you don’t want your hands.]

[Holy cow! Third Master’s change of expression, I’ve been killed through the screen.]

...

Charlotte Lane knew what had happened just by the speed at which Morris dropped his hand. She turned around to look at Kevin Clark.

Kevin Clark was still smiling tenderly at her.

George Dunn also laughed at this double standard of changing expressions.

Morris: “......”

Charlotte Lane comforted her brother and patted Morris’s arm. She then glanced at Kevin Clark and went on stage to accept the award.
